channel.title: Combat and NPC help
channel.description:
I posted a previous topic about NPC chat and I figured that out, but now im having more problems with my NPCs.
First of all Whenever I attack an NPC I dont hit anything. I am always hitting zero's. Second of all my NPCs dont move. Even when I put coordinates in they dont move to them.
If any one can help that would be awesome. I can upload pics, my server anything you need to help me.
P.S. I have searched for this on google and using the search bar and havent found anything on this problem.
